settings.newsletter_text: To keep our team and community safe, all made to order items will take longer than normal to ship out. We're offering 20% off our in stock collection with the code TOGETHER20.

settings.title: The long and winding road
settings.text: As long as we can remember, we've always been drawn to simplicity, beautiful designs and creating things. Our collections always draw inspiration from this, and the natural beauty in this world. We both come from a design-focused background; jewelry and accessories were always just a hobby. Once we knew that this is what we were passionate about, we realized that this is what we would dedicate our lives to – and we wanted to share it with the world. After several years of hard-work, our dream became a reality and we were able to finally put ourselves and our company out there. Our pieces are meant to be unique and timeless, something that you'll never want to take off and that you can wear your whole life.

settings.newsletter_richtext: Sign up to get the latest on sales, new releases and more …

settings.text: We use cookies on our website to give you the best shopping experience. By using this site, you agree to its use of cookies.

settings.title: What is your shipping policy?
settings.answer: We ship worldwide. Receive free shipping in the U.S and Canada on orders over $1000.

settings.title: What is your return policy?
settings.answer: If for any reason you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, you return your item(s) within 30 days of purchase. Sale items are final sale.

settings.title: Can I modify my order after it's been placed?
settings.answer: If you need to modify your order, please contact us within an hour of placing it. We'll do our best to help with your order, but if it has been shipped out already, it can not be modified.

settings.title: Where are your products made?
settings.answer: All jewelry and accessories are made in-house by our team.

settings.title: Are your gems and materials sourced responsibly?
settings.answer: The diamond industry has in the past been associated with conflict and exploitation, the industry has taken a number of pro-active steps to combat this, most notably in the form of the Kimberley Process (which certifies that diamonds originate from conflict free zones). Through our procurement and polishing division we are subject to rigorous requirements which set out the detailed standards that our procurement and polishing division is required to adhere to in order to maintain its status. Among other requirements there is a focus on supply chain management, provenance claims, child and forced labour and ethical standards generally.

settings.title: Can you repair my jewelry?
settings.answer:
For all repair inquiries, please email us. Please include your name, proof of purchase, and a description and photo of the damage to help us provide you with an accurate repair quote.

All repairs will be complete within 2 months of when we receive them.

settings.product_recommendations_heading: Not the perfect style for you? Try these instead:

settings.text:
We love hearing from you!

Please fill out the form below if you have any inquiries about our products, sizing, gifting, returns + exchanges or about your order.

settings.title: Visit us in store
settings.text:
Looking to view and try on our products in real life? Make an appointment and come visit our studio.

Appointments available Tuesday - Friday from 2 - 6pm and Sundays 1 - 5pm. Please call us at 1-800-555-5555 to book an appointment today!
